original_text: I clothed thee also with broidered work, and shod thee with badgers' skin, and I girded thee about with fine linen, and I covered thee with silk.
korean_text: 수 놓은 옷을 입히고 물돼지 가죽신을 신기고 가는 베로 두르고 모시로 덧입히고

sentences.original_text: I clothed thee also with broidered work
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 또한 너를 자수로 된 옷으로 입혔으며

sentences.original_text: and shod thee with badgers' skin
and I girded thee about with fine linen
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 고운 베로 띠를 띠웠으며

sentences.original_text: and I covered thee with silk
